FuncDef:
The suppress-flapping peer disable command disables IS-IS neighbor relationship flapping suppression globally.
The undo suppress-flapping peer disable command enables IS-IS neighbor relationship flapping suppression globally. The suppress-flapping peer disable command disables IS-IS neighbor relationship flapping suppression globally. The undo suppress-flapping peer disable command enables IS-IS neighbor relationship flapping suppression globally. By default, IS-IS neighbor relationship flapping suppression is enabled globally.
